T02D2032:120b-1: au pa de sha sva aa dhishth'i na kra ma rakta ya m'anta ka aa bhi sa ma ya /

T02D2032:121a-0: @121a * // de la dbang gi sems ni rnam par dag / rnal 'byor bdag nyid dag bya dang por ni //

T02D2032:121a-27: bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes pa'o //

T02D2032:121b-0: sdang ba rnam pa kun du @121b btang snyoms bya'o
T02D2032:121b-1: zhes pa'o // 'dis ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa bstan pa'o //

T02D2032:121b-35: bdug spos dang mar me dang /

T02D2032:129b-43: ma he gdul dka' 'dul byed phyir //
T02D2032:129b-44: khro bo shin tu chags sbyor phyir //
T02D2032:129b-45: sbom pa gang ba thob pa'i phyir //
T02D2032:129b-46: stag lpags la sogs khro bo'i phyir //
T02D2032:129b-47: skra grol ba ni grol ba'i phyir //
T02D2032:129b-48: snying rje'i ngo bo'i rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02D2032:130a-2: shes rab gri gug dngos po dang //
T02D2032:130a-3: dngos med lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D2032:130a-4: lta rdzas bdud rtsi myang ba'i phyir //
T02D2032:130a-5: ro dang ldan phyir thod pa'o //
T02D2032:130a-6: stong nyid ngo bo rtogs bya'i phyir /
T02D2032:130a-7: bud med gzugs su yang dag bstan //
T02D2032:130a-8: stong nying snying rje'i sbyor ba la /
T02D2032:130a-9: gnyis kyis sbyor ba bshad pa'o //
T02D2032:130a-10: dbang phyug brgyad kyi khyab bdag nyid //
T02D2032:130a-11: phyir ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams bstan //
T02D2032:130a-12: de phyir rdo rje thugs bsgrub phyir /
T02D2032:130a-14: zhes pa'i rnam par dag pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D2032:130a-15: bzang po'i blo yis 'dud kyi brtson pas sprul pa'i
T02D2032:130a-16: brjod pa rgya chen nus gur cig / de nyid
T02D2032:130a-17: de nyid rigs pas nges byas 'di ni sems can
T02D2032:130a-19: dpal ldan gshin rje'i dgra yis rab bsgrags rgyud chen sna tshogs bla ma dam pa yi //
T02D2032:130a-20: zhal las rtogs nas the tshom med pa'i yid kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pas byas //
T02D2032:130a-21: dad pa med par 'bras bu mi 'thob nyid //
T02D2032:130a-22: des na dad pa nyams pa nyid mi bya //
T02D2032:130a-23: blo gros bzang po mkhas pas sgrub thabs mchog /
T02D2032:130a-24: dag byas gshin rje gshed dmar skur gyur cig /
T02D2032:130a-25: gshin rje gshed dmar sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2032:130a-26: byas la bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02D2032:130a-27: de yis gshin rje gshed nyid de'i //
T02D2032:130a-28: rnal 'byor mchog la brtson par shog / rang byin
T02D2032:130a-29: gyis brlab pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa
T02D2032:130a-30: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs
T02D2032:130a-32: / slob dpon chen po mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa //
T02D2032:130a-33: pandi ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i
T02D2032:130a-34: dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas gus pas
T02D2032:130a-35: mnyan nas chag lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rje
